title: The Making of an American's Library
description: Excerpt from The Making of an American's LibraryThis series of essays first saw the light in the pages of The Bookman, New York, in the issues from October, 1913, to February, 1914. The only changes that have been made in them here are altera tions in a few words here and there necessitated by their transfer to book.
author: Arthur Elmore Bostwick
